1.0.0.en: Added support of Somneo Sleep & Wake-up Light device

1.1.0.en: Added new features: Bedtime tracking, Sunrise preview

1.2.0.en: Added new features: Device alarms sync with Homey application

1.3.0.en: Added new features: ID's for multiply devices in seacrh list. Fixed: Device stability, Alarms clocks syncing with Homey application, Alarms on/off ability in Homey application

1.4.0.en: Added new features: always on display flow, new maintenance action, insights logs and decreased requests count. Fixed: flow action cards

1.5.0.en: Added new features: radio/aux player, alarm clock capabilities, climate, alarms double-side HomeyApp <-> Somneo synchronization, new maintenance actions, new alarms flows and new advanced settings. Updated: Somneo API and general app performance.
